attributes.action: ban trade with china, vietnam, korea, and the rest of asia until they completely meet UK standards for animal protection and welfare
attributes.additional_details: all imports and exports with asia should be banned and EU support obtained to do the same. This is the only way to INSIST that all animal abuse, slaughter, poaching be stopped. Only in line with UK legislation should certain animals be slaughtered for food. There should be zero tolerance of abuse, slaughter, poaching of ANY type e.g. elephants, dogs, rhinos, dolphins, whales, tigers etc - ABSOLUTELY no animal should be allowed to be harmed, poached, slaughtered EXCEPT livestock grown in acceptable conditions for food as regulated in the UK.
